data.title: Must've Been Closing Time!!
data.text: I arrived for dinner at 9:30pm on a Thursday, which is not advised; the place wasn't empty, but it closes at 10pm. It took a minute before any employee even noticed that I entered the building. Although my server was attentive, I was very disappointed with this visit. I ordered a Long Island ice tea, which ALWAYS leaves me with a buzz, but not this time. I think that the bartender was too preoccupied with her closing duties to pour a proper drink. I also ordered the Black and Bleu burger, which is always delicious, but definitely NOT this time. They must've microwaved the burger because the small amount of bleu cheese on the burger was melted mess. Needless to say, it was horrible. I will revisit a Red Robin again, but I'll think twice about the West Covina location and I'll NEVER return near closing time!!

data.title: delicious & endless fries
data.text: Always a good burger, amazing thick french fries, the extra dipping sauces are always delicious too: bbq, honey mustard, blue cheese.  I like that there are new menu changes with burgers that are affordable and some that are pricey. the service is usually really good.  Neil makes an amazing shake too..

data.title: my favorite strawberry lemonade
data.text: food is good but the reason I keep going to this restaurant is their strawberry lemonade. We always go to Chino Hills and Brea Mall.  Friendly ambiance  and reasonable prices.

data.title: Burgers, Burgers, BURGERS!!
data.text: So much to choose from.  Great staff,  Amazing eats. Just all around great.  This restaurant I do have one some what close to where I live and I will be going back again to this place.  And the Sweet Potato fries are the best ever!!

data.title: Come for the BURGERS
data.text: If youre in the mood for a good burger and slaters 50/50 is too far come here. The wait is usually short if there is one at all. I have only tried the burgers and the drinks here they are fabulous. My sister tried a salad and it was sub par at best and small in size (that's her fault for not ordering a burger at a burger place). What they have that is far better than other places is ENDLESS fries and nice thick shakes! The burning love burger is my favorite however, it comes on and off of the menu frequently but if you ask they can always still make it. Its by far the best burger I have had ANYWHERE. This burger is the epitome of mouthwateringly juicy, spicy (but not too spicy) burger heaven. Do not waste your time on thin unnecessarily expensive patties like the ones served at 5 guys and Inn N Out. Do yourself a favor and come here. The service is good (on busy days like Sundays its understandably a little longer of a wait), food comes out quickly and if it doesn't they'll bring you fries while you wait. Awesome caring managers and especially suuper cool bartenders.

data.title: Horrible
data.text:
They changed there menu and now skimp on portions. They said its new plating, but my salad was half the size for the same 13 bucks. For some reason there chicken has also to a turn for the worse with flat processed chicken. So disappointed. 

The staff wasn't familiar with all the changes of the menus and plating either which made it frustrating. I will not be coming back to this establishment any time soon.

data.title: Good food, great service, bad parking
data.text: Always good friend and great service.  It's located in the mall though so parking is difficult, especially on the weekends.

data.title: Family fun food with good prices
data.text: American food for families and kids. Lots of foods to pick from. Big menu with lots of items to pick from. Burgers and soups too!

data.title: Great Menu Cariety
data.text: I've been to this restaurant a number of times and was never disappointed by the variety or food taste.  Some even have a very nice bar which was a bit surprising.  Oddly but tastefully decorated, but still not your deluxe restaurant.

data.title: They have seafood?
data.text: Yes, I'm that type of person that not only willtry the house special, but also the not ao regular item. So this month it was something other than burgers and it was chicken or seafood. My friends gave up meat for lent and they chose chicken items all different ways so I decided I wanted fried clams and not all the other stuff on the platter. The server made me the order for just clams and a salad instead of fries. The taste was great not gummy and the tartar sauce has a good kick in taste. I also had an onion ring from the "tower"my friend ordered. Those rings were huge, but also in flavor! The server tried to get us to order the new dessert , which was donuts on a ring type tray. I think we'll try that another time :)

data.title: Good Burgers !
data.text: Been there a few time's, place is usually crowded, service is always great. Burgers are very good, the onion rings and shakes are amazing. Its attached to the Mall so parking is a little crazy. Best bet is to park on the south side of the Mall and walk through the Mall to get to the restaurant. If you walk into JC Penny's, its a straight shot to Red Robin ( bottom floor ). Your gonna need the walk after you eat, I always over eat there.

data.title: TRY THE SALAD
data.text: I could try any one of the delicious choices in this restaurant, but the Crispy Chicken Salad is the best! A large serving, for sure, filled with fresh lettuce, chicken, chopped tomato, bacon, hard-boiled egg, cheese, and the tastiest Ranch dressing I've had!  Bread included. If you're hungry, try it...

data.title: Great family restaurant
data.text: Good casual place. Excellent for small groups. Fish and chips are moist and flavorful. Clam chowder is also delicious.

data.title: Good service, lovely place
data.text:
Food was great, service was prompt and nice ambiance. The waitress was courteous and she kept checking on my table, if everything was alright. I had the vege roll and i must say, is huge. FYI, i'm a petite lady, so for me, i'm a small eater. If you are somewhat a huge eater, this would be just nice.
If you love onion rings, give it a try. You will know what i mean by gigantic onion rings!

data.title: New style misses the mark
data.text:
Red Robin has the best burgers at a very good price. French fries cannot be beat.  It was a family restaurant, then the management decided to try and be like the sports bar or brewery style of restaurant. They are missing the mark with interior design and with understanding their very loyal customer base. 

I prefer sitting in the bar away from kids, but now I almost don't see families at this Red Robin. New styling is chasing them away.  I'm disappointed in the styling.

The burgers and fries are still great, but why they got rid of their iconic red baskets to put the fries in a fancy silver metal holder is a puzzle that I will never solve.  I fear this restaurant chain may go the way of Bob's Big Boy and some other really successful restaurants that lost out because the upper management wanted to go high brow.

NEVER forget your roots.  For a good gourmet style burger this is still the place to go.

data.title: My first Red Robin visit
data.text: Having never been to a Red Robin before,I went with my daughter while at the mall. The service was prompt and friendly,the food was perfect.The amount served was perfect and the food looked beautiful! The atmosphere couldve used some low music to drown out kitchen noises but all in all they made a great first impression with me.I would definatly recommend it to others.

data.title: Great meal, great price and great service!
data.text: We wanted a nice lunch nearby and decided on Red Robin. It was not too crowded and we had prompt service. The grilled chicken sandwich is excellent and with bottomless fries even better! Our waitress was training a new employee and they were both great. Very friendly. Many of Red Robins burgers are very good as well. The bill was pretty reasonable considering all you get. They even get you a drink to go if you desire. I highly recommend this establishment.

data.title: Prmotional Quality Food
data.text: Nothing so special about the food, except they jazz up the appearence a little but not worth the price.

data.title: Great food
data.text: I went to eat here with my two nephews and we liked it. There is lot’s to pick from on both the adult and kids menu. The food taste great and the service was great. The atmosphere is nice, I couldn’t find anything to complaint about.

data.title: I order the Guacamole Burger or 5 Alarm Burger.  They always give a balloon to my son and the staff always treats us...
data.text: I order the Guacamole Burger or 5 Alarm Burger.  They always give a balloon to my son and the staff always treats us well.
